rdf:Description.dc:subject: Animals, Legends and stories of
Tales, African
Africa, West
rdf:Description.dc:description: A collection of West African Animal Stories from Equatorial Guinea. This collection is divided into three parts representing the Mpongwe (living near Libreville), Benga (living on Corisco Island), and Fang peoples (who live throughout Equatorial Guinea and in neighboring regions in Cameroon and Gabon).
